alert.note: Alert for Black Hawk; Bremer; Butler; Grundy (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 8:24PM CDT until July 05 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Black Hawk County in northeastern Iowa... Bremer County in northeastern Iowa... Northeastern Grundy County in central Iowa... Southeastern Butler County in north central Iowa... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 824 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Tripoli to near Reinbeck, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Waterloo, Cedar Falls, Waverly, Evansdale, Jesup, La Porte City, Hudson, Sumner, Denver, Reinbeck, Tripoli, Shell Rock, Dike, Elk Run Heights, Waterloo Municipal Airport, Crossroads Mall, Uni-Dome And McLeod Center, Janesville, Washburn and Dunkerton. This includes Interstate 380 between mile markers 56 and 73. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
